Trade/Device Name(s): Next Generation Activated Aspartate Aminotransferase Assay
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Enzymatic rate method (measurement of NADH oxidation)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Abbott Laboratories Activated Aspartate Aminotransferase (AST/SGOT) assay for quantitation of AST in serum and plasma using enzymatic rate method on multiple Abbott platforms.
Indications for Use Summary: Device intended to measure aspartate aminotransferase (AST/SGOT) enzyme activity in serum and plasma for diagnosis and treatment of certain types of liver and heart disease.
